keyEvents.title: Disaster Backstory Revealed
keyEvents.description: Flashback reveals Caesar Clown detonated a chemical weapon on Punk Hazard four years ago, devastating the island.
keyEvents.significance: Explains the origin of the island's current wasteland state.

keyEvents.title: Kin'emon Found Frozen
keyEvents.description: Zoro, Sanji, and Brook discover Kin'emon's body parts frozen in the snow with his torso in the saltwater lake.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the harsh environment and danger of the island.

statusHistory.description: Revealed to have been destroyed by Caesar's chemical weapon four years ago

climate: Split between extreme heat and extreme cold due to Admiral battles
significance: Former government research facility turned wasteland after Caesar's chemical weapon detonation

reveals.information: Caesar Clown detonated a chemical weapon here four years ago when Vegapunk tried to dismiss him

keyEvents.title: G-5 Marines Begin Assault
keyEvents.description: Smoker and the G-5 Marines launch a frontal assault on Caesar's laboratory.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the beginning of the multi-pronged attack on Caesar's base.

keyEvents.title: Law and Chopper's Infiltration
keyEvents.description: Law and Chopper approach the laboratory from behind for stealth infiltration.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the tactical approach of the alliance.

keyEvents.title: Luffy's Dramatic Arrival
keyEvents.description: Luffy, Franky, and Robin crash-land at the laboratory entrance, with Luffy loudly announcing his plan to capture Caesar.
keyEvents.significance: Official start of the Pirate Alliance's operation to kidnap Caesar.

significance: Caesar Clown's base of operations where he conducts his experiments
